verses.text:
Weighed in the balance and found wanting,
Shall we hear the Chief works speak-ers say?
Shall we hear the Saviour's pleading,
While we from our sins are turning away?

Shall we hear the Chief works speak-ers say?
"Faithful servants" and "Well done," Or far down-cast awful sentence,
Shall we hear the Saviour's pleading,
While our sins are all forgiven?

Oh, we must be weighed and found wanting,
Warned in the balance of the Lord;
Shall we not heed the warning,
Shall we wait and found and wanting?

chorus.text:
Weighed in the balance and found wanting,
Shall we weigh and found wanting,
Shall we wait and found and wanting?
